articles.author: Maya Phillips
articles.title: Review: ‘The Kite Runner’ Trips From Page to Stage - The New York Times
articles.description: Amir Arison stars as a guilt-ridden Afghan refugee brooding over a childhood friendship in a stiff adaptation of Khaled Hosseini’s best-selling novel.
articles.content: Its easier in the novel to ride the twists and turns of Amirs journey, even as he leaves Hassan behind in the first third of the story. Onstage the play shuffles along, and its hard to stay invested … [+1168 chars]

articles.title: Shania Twain speaks out on her painful divorce from cheating ex-husband in new documentary trailer - Daily Mail
articles.description: Shania Twain addressed her painful divorce from her adulterous ex-husband Robert 'Mutt' Lange in the new trailer for her Netflix documentary Not Just a Girl. The trailer was released on Wednesday.

articles.title: ‘The Last Movie Stars’ Review: The Complicated Story of Paul Newman and Joanne Woodward - The New York Times
articles.description: Ethan Hawke’s HBO Max documentary “The Last Movie Stars” examines two great actors in their own, and many of their friends’, words.
articles.content: Children of Newman and Woodwards, and from Newmans first marriage, are strong presences, especially in the later episodes, but the most brutal, insightful and often hilarious commentary comes from th… [+1937 chars]

articles.title: George Clooney, U2, Amy Grant, Gladys Knight and Tania León Kennedy Center honorees - Daily Mail
articles.description: The John F. Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts announced Thursday that U2, George Clooney, singers Gladys Knight and Amy Grant and Cuban-American composer Tania León are being honored.
